about_the_game:
Floating, Colliding, Merging, Bursting

No grids, no turns—Bubbles in the Air is a real-time match-and-burst game.

Wander Through a Dog's Dream

The basic rules are simple: aim and shoot bubbles at your desired spot. Bubbles of the same color will merge, grow, and eventually burst—creating new bubbles in the process. Plus, a variety of tools and power-ups can drastically alter the gameplay.

Relaxing Yet Challenging

This game is perfect for casual players but offers surprising depth for those seeking a strategic challenge.

Exploring the dream worlds can be effortless: simply follow the basic "merge-and-burst" principle to progress through the levels. In harder stages, perseverance will eventually lead to victory, making Bubbles in the Air a calming experience where you can enjoy the gentle floating and colliding of bubbles to soothing music.

On the other hand, once you master the game's mechanics and strategies, "luck" ceases to be a factor. Every move becomes a calculated decision, turning the game into a test of skill and foresight. At this point, you can take on the additional challenges in each world—tasks that are nearly impossible to complete on luck alone!

Diverse Mechanics and Gameplay

Each major level in Bubbles in the Air introduces a new world, offering not just a fresh visual design but also brand-new mechanics.

Each world consists of 7 stages. After clearing all 7, your performance will be scored, and the special mode for that world will be unlocked.

Each special mode contains a single stage with mechanics based on that world’s unique feature but adjusted for endless gameplay—play as long as you can before failing.

Aim for high scores and set new records across multiple challenges!

short_description: Bubbles in the Air is a grid-free real-time matching game. In a dog's dream, colorful soap bubbles float and collide… The task is simple! Shoot bubbles, merge matching ones, and let them burst—creating even more bubbles. Can you make it to the end of the dream?
